title: [BIP-5] Integration with BSC
body:
BSC defi ecosystem now has an active community and many interesting DeFi projects, such as Venus, Pancake, Auto, etc. we also want to bring Bitcoin and Litecoin to BSC.

In order to open a new tunnel and implant our token economy on BSC, we plan to migrate some of the BOR tokens to the BSC so that our bridge is more robust.

Therefore, we propose to migrate in total of 20,000 BOR to BSC, 8000 allocated to Minting Mining, 8000 allocated to Boring Farm, and 4,000 from Reserved for initial tunnel pledges (oBTC, oLTC).

Also considering the locked assets in the BSC blockchain, we adjusted the Asset Ratio for oBTC (BSC) and oLTC (BSC) tunnels to 110% and opened up Liquidity Mining, Mint Mining, and Boring Farm.

Meanwhile, we invited Ankr team who has a good reputation in Crypro Asset Custody and BSC ecology to be our multi-signature nodes.

Let's bring decentralized Bitcoin and Litecoin to the new blockchain together!
author: 0xef5BdDa446e3031871A4EADC44ec1B79d5fcd806
